title: Deploy Jay Sports website (go live)

requirements.text: Ensure the application is fully built and deployed with all existing features intact, including the homepage hero section, product showcase with INR prices, about section, contact section with real address/phone/email, sticky navigation with the Jay Sports logo image, and the bold athletic visual theme.
acceptanceCriteria: The application deploys successfully without build or deployment errors
All sections (Hero, Products, About, Contact) are visible and functional on the live deployment
The Jay Sports logo image is displayed in the navigation bar
Product prices are shown in Indian Rupees (₹)
Contact section displays the correct address (196 - New Colony Ratnipora, Pulwama, 192304, Jammu and Kashmir), phone (+91 70069 81592), and email (jaysports.in@gmail.com)
The dark athletic theme with electric red accents is applied consistently across all sections

constraints: Do not change any existing feature implementations — only ensure the app builds and deploys cleanly
Do not modify immutable frontend paths (hooks, main.tsx, ui components)
nonGoals: Changing existing content, prices, or contact details
Redesigning any part of the UI
